scripts.deploy-satsuma: graph deploy gmx-arbitrum-stats --version-label $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date '+%y%m%d%H%M%S')-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $(cat .satsuma_token)
scripts.deploy-satsuma:cantoTestnet: graph deploy gmx-arbitrum-stats --version-label $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date '+%y%m%d%H%M%S')-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --node http://localhost:8020 --ipfs http://localhost:5001/
scripts.redeploy-local: yarn remove-local && yarn create-local && yarn deploy-local
